text: Arau teraemi akasasamuha arau prthiraika chaya dinata srsti karaiche; arau te'omra arasba achila panira oparata, tomalokara majata amalata kona sraestha seya paraiksa karaara babe, arau tumi yadi koraa ye, ‘niscaya mrtyura pichata tomalokaka punaraut'thana karaa ha’ba’, tetiya kaphirasakale arasye ka’ba, ‘eya spasta yadu’
